Description: Clay tablet; fragment; rations of barley and beer for troops (including Kassites) stationed at Kar-Utu; seals; Old Babylonian.
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.217)
Frayne, RIME 4 / Old Babylonian Period (2003-1595 BC) (RIM.E.4.3.9.2015)
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
